scripts.format: prettier --write --parser typescript 'src/**/*.ts' 'tests/**/*.ts' && ESLINT_MODE=fix node -r tsconfig-paths/register -r ts-node/register ./node_modules/.bin/eslint --fix 'src/**/*.ts' 'tests/**/*.ts'
scripts.lint: ESLINT_MODE=lint node -r tsconfig-paths/register -r ts-node/register ./node_modules/.bin/eslint 'src/**/*.ts' 'tests/**/*.ts' && prettier --check --parser typescript 'src/**/*.ts' 'tests/**/*.ts'
scripts.change-major: npm version major -m "Change version number to v%s"
scripts.change-minor: npm version minor -m "Change version number to v%s"
scripts.change-patch: npm version patch -m "Change version number to v%s"
